sig_info: Redwing Lock-On lasts 2 second(s) longer, Attack Rating is increased by 4.15 to 28.22 and allows Captain America to inflict Ruptures from Special 2 through blocks.
When either Champion performs a Well-Timed Block, Captain America inflicts a Sapped Charge on the Opponent.
When an Opponent Miss fails or when their Ability fails due to low Ability Accuracy, an instant Rupture is inflicted, dealing 4.15 to 20.75 Physical Damage. Damage scales with Base Attack only.
